title: Snow Day Malzahar Recall Bug
body: Just finished an Aram with Snow Day Malzahar. When i went to recall the voidling that appears when Malz  does his recall animation isnt detailed. It is just a solid blue voidling. Other players were able to see the voidling all blue as well so it wasnt just me. To test this i made a custom aram/summoners rift game to test it. The problem persisted in both custom games.

replies.body:
Heya! 

Thanks so much for the report! We've been looking into this and it appears that it's a missing texture. D: We're working on a fix!
